title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 130.3 - Filing procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 130.3 - Filing procedure

State Regulations

Each local law shall be filed on a form or in a manner
provided by the department. If additional pages are required, they must be of
the same size as the form. For convenience, printed, photocopied or typewritten
copies of the text may be affixed to the form, but these shall not be of a size
larger than the form. To ensure reproduction by the department's record
retention equipment, only true and legible copies will be accepted for
filing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19

130.3

Amended

New

York State Register March 5, 2025/Volume XLVII, Issue 09, eff. 3/5/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
